hero.name: Jackie!
hero.description: Forget boring taxi rides! I'm here to show you the REAL Medellín with style, safety, and way too much fun. New 2025 car, perfect English, and all the local tea ☕

services.title: Choose Your
services.subtitle: From airport pickups to epic day trips - I've got your transportation covered with style and good vibes only! 🌟

airport.title: Airport Vibes ✈️
airport.description: No more sketchy airport pickups! I'll be there with a big smile (and AC)
features: Flight tracking (I know when you land) 📲

guatape.title: Guatapé Magic 🌈
guatape.description: THE iconic day trip! Climb El Peñol rock, explore the colorful town, eat at hidden gem spots
features: El Peñol Rock - 740 steps to heaven 🏔️

comuna13.title: Comuna 13 Vibes 🎨
comuna13.description: From war zone to art zone - see Medellín's most inspiring transformation story!

coffee.title: Coffee Farm Adventure ☕
coffee.description: Bean-to-cup experience in Colombia's coffee country - taste the real deal!

paragliding.title: Paragliding Thrill 🪂
paragliding.description: Fly over Medellín like a bird! Epic views + adrenaline rush = unforgettable

pablo.title: Pablo History Tour 🕵️
pablo.description: Controversial but curious? See the real story - not glorified, just facts

nightlife.title: Food & Nightlife 🍻
nightlife.description: Eat like a local, party like a local - salsa, drinks, and epic eats!

multiday.title: Multi-Day Chauffeur 🚗
multiday.description: Need a driver for the whole trip? I got you covered for days/weeks!

about.title: Why Everyone
about.description: Born and raised in Medellín (so I know ALL the spots 📍), I've been the go-to driver for cool travelers for 5+ years. Fluent in English and Spanish, always with the best playlist, and committed to making your Colombian adventure absolutely unforgettable!
about.followText: Follow me for daily Medellín vibes & travel inspo! 📸
about.betterPricesSub: No sneaky app fees - just honest pricing
about.personalTouchSub: Direct chat with me - customize everything!
about.localSecretsSub: Hidden gems that tourists never find

testimonials.title: What My
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take my word for it - here's what awesome people are saying! 🌟

cta.title: Let's Make Your
cta.description: Book directly with me on WhatsApp - I'll customize the perfect experience for you. No app fees, no middlemen, just awesome vibes and unforgettable memories! 🌟

footer.tagline: Your trusted bilingual driver in Medellín 🇨🇴
footer.description: Direct booking • New 2025 car • Airport pickups • Private tours • Multi-day chauffeur
